thread.title: BRIEF-Amtrust Financial Says Has Been Responding To An SEC Investigation Since June 2013

title: BRIEF-Amtrust Financial Says Has Been Responding To An SEC Investigation Since June 2013
text:
May 4, 2018 / 6:33 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Amtrust Financial Says Has Been Responding To An SEC Investigation Since June 2013 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 4 (Reuters) - AmTrust Financial Services Inc:
* AMTRUST FINANCIAL SERVICES SAYS SINCE JUNE 2013, CO HAS BEEN RESPONDING TO AN INVESTIGATION BY THE SEC - PROXY FILING
* AMTRUST FINANCIAL SAYS SEC INVESTIGATION INCLUDED A REVIEW OF COâ€™S INVESTMENT IN LIFE SETTLEMENT CONTRACTS - SEC FILING
* AMTRUST FINANCIAL SAYS INVESTIGATION INCLUDED A REVIEW OF ACQUISITION OF LUXEMBOURG CAPTIVES, CERTAIN ACCOUNTING PRACTICES
* AMTRUST FINANCIAL SAYS HAS BEEN RESPONSIVE TO THE SEC'S ONGOING INQUIRY Source text: ( bit.ly/2wbOcnD ) Further company coverage:
